title: StreamingFilesDataset fixes
body_html:
This PR fixes an issue with StreamingFilesDataset, where the remote call always returns a string. Now the remote call will output a dataset with types based on the output types of the source dataset.

Additionally, 2a6c599 introduced some functionality so that StreamingFilesDataset always emits the 0th element of the remote call (not sure why). I just did a small fix to get that working again if multiple output types are specified.
body_text:
This PR fixes an issue with StreamingFilesDataset, where the remote call always returns a string. Now the remote call will output a dataset with types based on the output types of the source dataset.
Additionally, 2a6c599 introduced some functionality so that StreamingFilesDataset always emits the 0th element of the remote call (not sure why). I just did a small fix to get that working again if multiple output types are specified.
body:
This PR fixes an issue with StreamingFilesDataset, where the remote call always returns a string. Now the remote call will output a dataset with types based on the output types of the source dataset.

Additionally, 2a6c599 introduced some functionality so that StreamingFilesDataset always emits the 0th element of the remote call (not sure why). I just did a small fix to get that working again if multiple output types are specified.
